mapper.select: SELECT no, title, writer, content, view_cnt, TO_CHAR(reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS regDate, game_id FROM t_board ORDER BY reg_date DESC
SELECT no, title, writer, content, view_cnt AS viewCnt, TO_CHAR(reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS regDate, game_id AS gameId FROM t_board WHERE no = #{no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_board (no, title, writer, content, view_cnt, reg_date, game_id) VALUES ( seq_t_board_no.nextval, #{title}, #{writer}, #{content}, #{viewCnt}, SYSDATE, #{gameId,jdbcType=INTEGER} )
